name: Ehsan Aybak
story: Ehsan Aybak grew up in a small village in Iran. He was always fascinated by the stories of his father who served in the military. At the age of 18, Ehsan decided to join the Iranian army. After completing his basic training, he was selected for the recon scout program. He became a skilled AT expert, able to take out enemy tanks with precision. His cautious and detail-oriented nature made him a valuable asset in the field. However, after a disagreement with his commanding officer, he deserted the Iranian army and joined the OPFOR.
